name: The damn newspaper
description:
A game about a old man that just wants to read its newspaper... but he keeps forgeting something. Find everything so you can go home and just enjoy reading the damn newspaper.

Controls and how to play:

W - Move Forward

A, S and D - Rotate player

Old man loses velocity over time he walks and he needs to rest on a bench in order to have the velocity refilled and can find or lose something.

Credits: 

João Alves de Sousa - Game Design, drawings, animation.

Marcos Engelhard - Programming

Sara Alves de Sousa - Music

Jorge Tavares - Voices

Footsteps on Leaves SOUND EFFECT - Gravel Fuß Schritte auf Blätter Kiesel Sandweg (Berlin Atmospheres)

Park - SOUND EFFECTS - Birds Outside City Ambience SOUND (Berlin Atmospheres)
